009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.AlgebraicCircle;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
016
017public abstract class CircleFitAlgebraic {
018        
019        public enum FitType {
020                KasaOrig,
021                KasaA,
022                KasaB,
023                Pratt,
024                Hyper,
025                Taubin
026        }
027        
028        public static CircleFitAlgebraic getFit(FitType type, Pnt2d[] points) {
029                switch (type) {
030                case Hyper:     return new CircleFitHyper(points);
031                case KasaA:     return new CircleFitKasaA(points);
032                case KasaB:     return new CircleFitKasaB(points);
033                case KasaOrig:  return new CircleFitKasa(points);
034                case Pratt:     return new CircleFitPratt(points);
035                case Taubin:    return new CircleFitTaubin(points);
036                default: return null;
037                }
038        }
039        
040        /**
041         * Returns the parameters (A, B, C, D) of the {@link AlgebraicCircle}
042         * or {@code null} if the fit was unsuccessful.
043         * Parameters are not normalized.
044         * 
045         * @return the algebraic circle parameters or {@code null}
046         */
047        public abstract double[] getParameters();
048        
049        
050        /**
051         * Returns a {@link AlgebraicCircle} instance for this fit 
052         * or {@code null} if the fit was unsuccessful.
053         * @return a {@link AlgebraicCircle} instance or null
054         */
055        public AlgebraicCircle getAlgebraicCircle() {
056                double[] p = getParameters();
057                return (p == null) ? null : new AlgebraicCircle(p);
058        }
059        
060        /**
061         * Returns a {@link GeometricCircle} instance for this fit 
062         * or {@code null} if the fit was unsuccessful.
063         * @return a {@link GeometricCircle} instance or null
064         */
065        public GeometricCircle getGeometricCircle() {
066                double[] q = this.getParameters();      // assumed to be (A, B, C, D)
067                if (q == null || isZero(q[0])) {        // (abs(2 * A / s) < (1 / Rmax))
068                        return null;                    // return a straight line
069                }
070                else {
071                        return new GeometricCircle(getAlgebraicCircle());
072                }
073        }
074        
075}
